alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:04PM EDT until July 20 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Huron County in north central Ohio... Southern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 803 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wadsworth to 6 miles west of Savannah, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. Trees were reported down in New London with these thunderstorms. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Medina, Wooster, Ashland, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, New London, Creston, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Mount Eaton, Sullivan and Seville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Wayne
